name: Castlevania-Land-Of-Benediction
description:
3d game Castlevania Land Of Benediction flowing story of Castlevania - Symphony of the Night

your are in the begging of Dracula Castle , You star as weak skeleton warrior ,Kill Enemy to unlock Him In character list.

Defeat Enemy Using weapon,shield,Fire,lighting,Dark,Curse,Stun.......

            NOTE ; Only One Stage available now But Update new character,new- area,spell,weather  are coming
